license-maven-plugin
Last Published: 2023-02-10  | Version: 1.15.0-SNAPSHOT
license-maven-plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

license:dependency-license-export

Full name:

io.github.coolbeevip:license-maven-plugin:1.15.0-SNAPSHOT:dependency-license-export

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Executes as an aggregator plugin.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: verify.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<deep> int 1.4.0 Indirect Dependency Analysis Depth
Default value is: 100.
User property is: deep.
<format> String 1.3.0 Report format: csv txt pom
Default value is: csv.
User property is: format.
<ignoreGroupIds> String 1.3.0 Ignore artifact groupId, multiple commas separated, for example: org.my.project,org.your.project
User property is: ignoreGroupIds.
<license> String 1.3.0 Try to crawl https://search.maven.org/artifact/ data to get License information
Default value is: false.
User property is: license.
<timeout> int 1.3.0 Analysis timeout sec
Default value is: 60.
User property is: timeout.

Parameter Details

<deep>

Indirect Dependency Analysis Depth
  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.4.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: deep
  • Default: 100

<format>

Report format: csv txt pom
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.3.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: format
  • Default: csv

<ignoreGroupIds>

Ignore artifact groupId, multiple commas separated, for example: org.my.project,org.your.project
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.3.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: ignoreGroupIds

<license>

Try to crawl https://search.maven.org/artifact/ data to get License information
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.3.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: license
  • Default: false

<timeout>

Analysis timeout sec
  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.3.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: timeout
  • Default: 60
